alert.note: Alert for Bosque; Comanche; Erath; Hamilton; Mills; Somervell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 6:17AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Somervell, central Hamilton, southeastern Erath, northwestern Bosque, northeastern Mills and southeastern Comanche Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 616 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Gustine, or 16 miles southeast of Comanche, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Meridian, Hico, Gustine, Iredell, Meridian State Park, Walnut Springs, Purves, Clairette, Olin, Duffau, Edna Hill, Energy, Johnsville, Gentrys Mill, Carlton, Lamkin, Priddy, Indian Gap and Newburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for central and north central Texas. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for central and north central Texas.
